name: AI-Powered Email Campaign using a Name-Email Database
description:
This HARPA AI + MAKE.COM scenario enriches your name-email database and creates personalized outreach emails to promote your offerings.

You only need a name-email database that works with Google Sheets. Don't have one? You can export contacts from services like Hunter.io, Tomba.io, Dropcontact.io, findymail.com, or Instantly.

If Google Sheets isn't your preferred tool, feel free to use Airtable or another CRM solution.

Here's how it works:
- HARPA scans company websites after receiving an email to gather targeting data
- Updates information in your Google Sheets 
- Creates a personalized email message
- Sends through your email service of choice (works with Mailgun, Gmail and most providers)

Required AI Commands to import into your HARPA:

1. Cold Outreach Email Generator: https://harpa.ai/library/cold-outreach-email-generator/67a22cb61a57f0776dfdfc6d

2. Database Enrichment: https://harpa.ai/library/database-enrichment/6728a09322b006c16f7f43e3
